m_szDocTitle: Despite China Slowdown, Global Economy Expected To Gain Momentum In 2016 And 2017
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Despite China Slowdown, Global Economy Expected To Gain Momentum In 2016 And 2017 By John Simons @thinksimons On 11/09/15 AT 6:04 AM Global trade and economic activity--held back by China in 2015--is expected to show a modest revival over the next two years. An employee assembles an electric car along a production line at a factory in Qingzhou, Shandong province, China. The country's factory activity has fallen for eight consecutive months. Photo: REUTERS/China Daily A slowing China wonâ€™t stop the global economy from gaining momentum over the next two years. Gl
